document_data.name: Dahl Peredur
document_data.mainbody: '''Dahl Peredur''' was an antiquarian and [[Harper]] apprentice. He was formerly a novice [[Oghma]]n [[paladin]] but he fell from grace for reasons he didn't understand.{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils|5402}}
document_data.Skills: Dahl was fairly skilled at [[ritual]] [[magic]].{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils|1379}} He was also well educated, which was to be expected from a follower of Oghma.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils|?}}
